forms.name: show_image
forms.title: Show an image
forms.description: Shows you an image. This is a 'raw' output type where the script writes a complete HTTP response to stdout, which is directly streamed to the browser by scriptform.

forms.name: large_bin
forms.title: Download large binary file
forms.description: Download a large (100mb) binary file. This demonstrated streaming directly to the client of large files.

forms.name: some_html
forms.title: Show some HTML
forms.description: This is the 'html' output type, which allows HTML in the output of scripts. This can be useful to refer to another form after this form is completed, for instance.

forms.name: escaped
forms.title: Escaped contents (default)
forms.description: This is the 'escaped' output type. It is the default. The HTML entities in the output are escaped properly, and is wrapped in PRE elements.
